transArray.content: The room is very clean and the decoration is modern and simple. A comfortable stay! There is a parking lot at the door, where you can park. The location is easy to find, at the intersection of Yaojiayuan Road and Shifoying Road, next to Dayali Hotel. The recently opened Chaoyang Railway Station is also nearby, just a few minutes' walk away! The transportation is very convenient!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you very much for your support and recognition of the hotel. Everything we do is to bring a different holiday experience to every guest. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time.
